Desc.eng: What a nice surprise! What brings you here, hunter?
You know, it's just… silly. I was up in the mountains and… I found a swamp lily and it occurred to me that you used to brew potions of these, so...
He found it. But of course. Much rather paid a fortune for this ugly weed.

You are such a charming man, Van Helsing! But I can't let you leave empty-handed. Here, take this! A medalion, crafted by me personally. It's not too strong at the moment, but the more magic you use around it, the stronger it will become.
Thank you. I'm really grateful. See, Katarina? Good deeds and nice manners always pay off. You should try it someday.
